about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Jalgaon (Maharashtra) based Spectrum Electrical Industries Limited is a company engaged in the business of design and manufacturing of electrical, automobile and irrigation components. The company is a contract manufacturer and component suppliers to leading industry players.

Spectrum Electrical offers end-to-end product solutions to its customers under the B2B model. It provides services ranging from global sourcing, manufacturing, quality testing and packaging to logistics. The company also offers products in the intermediate stages to its customers.

The manufacturing unit of the company is located at Jalgaon & Nashik, Maharashtra.

The company's turnover in fiscal 2017, 2016 and 2015 are 10,020.41 lakhs, 9,503.07 lakhs, and 8,085.99 lakhs respectively.

The PAT for fiscal 2017, 2016 and 2015 are 349.70 lakhs, 247.04 lakhs, and 184.66 lakhs.

The company has 370 full-time employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Spectrum Electrical IPO?
faqs.answer:
Spectrum Electrical IPO is a SME IPO of 3980000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹25.87 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹65 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 17, 2018, and closes on September 21, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Spectrum Electrical IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Spectrum Electrical IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Spectrum Electrical IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Spectrum Electrical IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Spectrum Electrical IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Spectrum Electrical IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Spectrum Electrical IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
